## TaskState type

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type TaskState<R, E> =
  | {
      stage: TaskStage.Pending;
    }
  | {
      stage: TaskStage.Resolved;
      result: R;
    }
  | {
      stage: TaskStage.Rejected;
      error: E;
    }
  | {
      stage: TaskStage.Aborted;
      error: TaskAbortError | E;
    };
```
